short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all those annoying threads on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you sick of pointless Twitter threads? Even the ones with a point are annoying at this point. It's just thread, thread, thread, thread, thread these days.

This extension removes all Twitter threads when you browse Twitter.com so that you can focus on...errr...getting annoyed about something else instead?
